<script async defer src="//platform.instagram.com/en_US/embeds.js"></script>
<p>A bit more people than expected at 15! Games played were Bang! The Dice Game, Flash Point, Catan and King of Tokyo. Judging by the noise level (shhhhhhhh!!), King of Tokyo was the hypest game tonight. Something about using the power to re-roll a die to avoid a final blow...</p>
